member.name: T:SySal.Executables.GetDBMarks.Exe
member.summary: GetDBMarks - Command line tool to read mark sets from the DB in a format that can be used for scanning.

remarks.para: type can be either nominal or calibrated. The explicit Id of the calibration can be given as an alternative.

member.name: M:SySal.Executables.GetDBMarks.Exe.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
